introduction.title: Welcome to 1A2B game!
introduction.content: There are 10 stages. Player has to guess which 4 letters are given. Let's select a stage and start the game!

description.stage1: Each word is a number between 0 and 9.
description.stage2: Each word is a lowercase alphabet.
description.stage3: The first word is a lowercase alphabet. The rest of words are numbers between 0 and 9.
description.stage4: The first two words are lowercase alphabets. The rest of words are numbers between 0 and 9.
description.stage5: The last word is a number between 0 and 9. The rest of words are lowercase alphabets.
description.stage6: The first word is a lowercase alphabet or a number between 0 and 9. The rest of words are numbers between 0 and 9.
description.stage7: Both first two words are a lowercase alphabet or a number between 0 and 9. The rest of words are numbers between 0 and 9.
description.stage8: The first word is a lowercase alphabet or a number between 0 and 9. The rest of words are alphabets.
description.stage9: Both first two words are a lowercase alphabet or a number between 0 and 9. The rest of words are alphabets.
description.stage10: Each word is a lowercase alphabet or a number between 0 and 9.
